gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 120, Kings 115
gameRecap.excerpt: Despite Luka Doncic's 28 points, 10 rebounds and 17 assists, the Mavericks fall to the Kings, 120-115. De'Aaron Fox recorded a game-high 34 points, along with five assists for the Kings, while Domantas Sabonis added 17 points and 11 rebounds in the victory. Doncic tallied his 9th triple-double of the season and 64th of his career. The Kings improve to 26-18 on the season, while the Mavericks fall to 25-21.
